name: 真乃＆めぐる
text: 灯織ちゃん……っ
trans: Hiori-chan...!

name: 灯織
text: 真乃、めぐる
trans: Mano, Meguru...

name: 真乃
text: 配信の準備してるの……？
trans: Are you preparing for the stream...?

name: 灯織
text:
うん
前回大ボス戦直前で止めたし、きっと今回で終わるでしょ？
trans: Yeah. Last time we stopped playing right before the big boss. So this is going to be the last time, right?

name: 灯織
text:
今日の担当、私だから……
なるべく、スムーズに進めたくて
trans:
And it's my turn to play... 
So I want to make sure things go as smoothly as possible.

name: 灯織
text:
装備とか、パーティー編成とか、アイテムとか……
事前にできることやっておこうと思って
trans:
My gear, my party line-up, my items...
Anything I can do beforehand, I figured I should get it out of the way now...

name: めぐる
text: ……そうだね！
trans: ......Good call!

name: めぐる
text:
わたしたちが操作に慣れなくてあたふたしてるの、
みんなは見守ってくれてたけど……
trans: Everyone's been putting up with us freaking out every time because we couldn't get used to the controls, but...

name: 灯織
text:
思い返すと、いつも何かが上手くできなくて、
ドタバタしてたよね
trans: Looking back on it now it's been a bit of a slapstick, how we kept messing up every time.

name: めぐる
text: ねー！
trans: Sure was!

name: めぐる
text: ──ね、ふたりは最初の頃の配信、覚えてる？
trans: ──Hey, do you remember our first couple of streams?

name: 真乃
text: うんっ、覚えてるよ……っ
trans: Yeah, I remember...!

name: 真乃
text:
ボタンの配置が覚えられなくて、
村人さんに話かけたいのにメニューを開いちゃったり……
trans: I couldn't get the button layout into my head, so I kept accidentally opening the menu when I wanted to talk to a villager...

name: 灯織
text: 必要ないのに、薬草使ったり……
trans: Or using healing herbs when we didn't need them...

name: めぐる
text:
したした！　……今考えると、
とってもつたない配信だったなーって思うよ……
trans:
Me too! 
...Thinking about it now, our first streams were way too clumsy...

name: めぐる
text: 最後くらいは、完璧！　って自信もって終わりたいなぁ……
trans: So I hope we get to finish strong by making this last episode a totally flawless one...!

name: 灯織
text: ……うん

name: 真乃
text:
私たち、ゲームも生配信も
全然慣れてなかったから……
trans: Well, we weren't used to games or streaming at all, so...

name: 真乃
text: だから──配信のお仕事が来た時は驚いたなぁ……っ
trans: I was really surprised when we got the offer...!

name: 灯織
text: ふふっ……そうだね
trans: Heh... Me too.

name: 灯織
text: 思わず、どうしてですかって聞いちゃって
trans: I was so surprised I actually blurted out a "why?"...

name: めぐる
text:
わたしたちと同世代の女の子と、
アイドルが好きな人たちへのアプローチ……かぁ
trans: They said they wanted to target girls around our age as well as idol fans, huh...

name: めぐる
text: ちゃんとできてたかなぁ……？
trans: Think we managed to do that...?

name: 灯織
text:
どうだろう……
……あんまり自信ない、かな……
trans:
I wonder... 
......I'm not exactly confident we did, I guess...

name: 真乃
text:
──あっ……
あのねっ、私、お話したの
trans:
──Oh...
Actually, I talked to one of them.

name: 真乃
text:
この前のイベントの時に、ファンの女の子と……
そしたら、『ゲーム買いました！』って……っ
trans:
At that event some time ago, a girl came up to me... 
And she told me she'd bought the game...!

name: めぐる
text: わぁ……！　そうなの！？
trans: Wow...! Really!?

name: 灯織
text: そうなんだ……なんか、嬉しいね
trans:
She did, huh... 
Kinda makes you happy, doesn't it?

name: 灯織
text: 配信、喜んでくれてたのかな……
trans: I wonder if she enjoyed our streams...

name: めぐる
text: うん、きっと……
trans: Yeah, she must have...

name: めぐる
text:
──って、わたしが言えることじゃないけどね！？
だといいなーって……
trans:
──is what I wanna say, but that's not up to me, is
it? I just hope she did...!

name: 灯織
text: ふふ、……うん
trans: Heh... yeah.

name: めぐる
text: あーあ、最後かー……！
trans: Aawh, so this is really gonna be the last time, huh...!

name: めぐる
text:
始まる前は不安でいっぱいだったのに、
いざ終わるとなると、寂しくなっちゃうんだもん……
trans: I was so nervous when we were gonna start doing this, but now that it's almost over I'm already starting to miss it...

name: 真乃
text: 最近は、操作しながらお話する余裕もできたもんね……っ
trans: Yeah. We've only just gotten comfortable enough that we can play the game and talk at the same time...

name: 灯織
text:
というか、最初の頃に
余裕がなさすぎたんだよね
trans: If I'm being honest, we were way too uncomfortable with the whole thing at first.

name: 灯織
text: おさらいしようと思って、１回目を見直したんだけど……
trans: I watched the first episode again to refresh my memory, but...

name: 灯織
text:
ふたりはそうでもないのに
私はガチガチに緊張してて、すごく恥ずかしかった
trans: The two of you weren't doing so bad, but I was shaking like a leaf. It was seriously embarrassing.

name: 真乃
text:
そ、そんなことないよ灯織ちゃん……っ
私も最初の時、すごく緊張したよ……っ
trans:
D-Don't say that, Hiori-chan...!
I was very nervous too, at first...!

name: めぐる
text: わたしも！
trans: Me too!

name: めぐる
text:
リアルタイムで交流できるのに、
対面じゃないって初めてだったから……
trans: Interacting in real-time with people we can't actually see, that was a first for me...

name: めぐる
text:
戸惑ったなー、
相手の顔が見えないのに、反応は返ってくるの
trans: It was confusing at first, seeing reactions coming back without any faces to go with them...

name: 真乃
text:
そうだね……でも、何回かやっていくうちに、
見てる人たちも、私たちも、だんだん慣れてきて……っ
trans: Yeah... But after a couple of times, the viewers and us, we all got used to it little by little, and...

name: 真乃
text:
……慣れてきたけど、
終わっちゃうんだね……
trans: ......We've gotten used to it, but now it's going to be over already...

name: 灯織
text: 寂しいけど、終わらせないままはできないから……
trans: It's too bad, but it can't go on forever...

name: 灯織
text:
……準備、再開しよう
──ふたりとも、手伝ってくれる？
trans:
......Let's get back to preparing. 
ーCould you two lend me a hand?

name: 灯織
text:
とうとう最終回です
今まで本当にありがとうございました
trans: At long last, we've arrived at the series finale. Thank you for sticking with us until now.

name: 灯織
text: 最後まで、私たちと一緒に冒険してくれますか？
trans: Will you join us on our quest until the very end?

name: 灯織
text: ふふっ……頼りにしてますね？
trans: Heh... I'm counting on all of you, okay?

name: 灯織
text: ──真乃、めぐる
trans: ──Mano, Meguru.

name: 真乃＆めぐる
text: ……うんっ
trans: ...Yeah!

name: 一同
text: ──イルミネの『RPGのススメ』始まります！
trans: ──It's time for Illumine's "RPG Rally"!
